thread.title: Boeing Lands Huge American Airlines Order

author: Doug Cameron
title: Boeing Lands Huge American Airlines Order

organizations.name: boeing lands huge american airlines order american airlines group inc.

text:
American Airlines Group Inc. on Friday announced a huge order for Boeing Co. twin-aisle jets worth more than $12 billion before discounts and canceled a deal to buy rival Airbus SE planes.
The world’s largest airline plans to buy 47 new Boeing 787 wide-body aircraft that will start arriving in 2020, and phase out its Airbus twin-aisle planes.
